summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD FUSION.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING, THE WRENCH WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON THE INSTRUMENT PANEL AND THE VEHICLE WAS RESISTANT TO SHIFTING GEARS.  A LOCAL MECHANIC DIAGNOSED THAT THERE WAS A THROTTLE BODY DEFECT.  NEITHER THE DEALER NOR THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE.  THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED.  THE FAILURE AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 54,500.
